participant_1.background:
I wish my mother was here to see me win my first powerlifting competition at the frozen tundra.
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
i am a scientist.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.
my favorite food is a cheeseburger.

participant_2.background:
I drive my car to work at an insurance firm.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonalds.
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
I love having my dog around because he always makes me laugh.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Not good, I had to say goodbye to my dog this morning.
I am sorry to hear that. I love my dog, I know how you feel.
Thanks. I dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
What do you do at the theater?
I act. I just got a part in a play about a scientist.
That sounds fun. I am a scientist myself.
I study the effects of climate change on the environment.
That sounds important. Do you like your job?
I do. I am passionate about making a difference in the world.
That is great. I am glad you have a job you are passionate about.
Thanks. I hope you feel better about your dog.
